explains: adj. 缺席投票的；缺席的

sentences.en: He has already voted by absentee ballot.
sentences.cn: 他已经通过缺席投票的方式投了票。

sentences.en: Absentee fathers will be forced to pay child support.
sentences.cn: 不和孩子在一起的父亲会被强制支付子女抚养费。

sentences.en: The finish line is near. Don't stop yet. Don't be an absentee.
sentences.cn: 在毕业临近的时候，不要止步，不要旷课。
